A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you come to this film expecting something similar to the previous movies\, then you will be sadly disappointed. The problem with this movie is that there is not prequel that sets this movie up for its much acclaimed anticipation. I believe that is the reasoning behind the negative reviews for this film. If you look at it with an open mind to a story that sets the tone for a whole new generation of Jedi’s and Sith Lords\, then you will enjoy this movie as part of a legacy that has gone through generations of fans. Great movie. Great concept. Great story.
